Texts.Eng: Compared to the Sifter, the Rock Breaker is slower and needs more power, but it allows for much more resource extracting than the Sifter alone. Upgrade to a ^orange;Rock Crusher^reset; when you can, as those are much more efficient.

The ^orange;Sifter^reset; is great for pulling apart loose materials, but to break up ^green;stone types^reset; like ^orange;cobblestone^reset; or ^orange;conglomerate^reset; you'll need a ^orange;Rock Breaker^reset;. Build one now at your ^orange;Electronics Center^;.
